title: Streamixio
author: Streamixio
content: Eco X SpaceNEW UK NFT Eco homes - An Ethical Approach to Climate Change➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖EcoXSpace British Based Project that will take your crypto to a whole new world of passive income.A hyper-deflationary decentralized buyback token, a community-driven project that aims to reduce global warming by using the crypto ecosystem to wage a war against climate change. By creating a crypto-based renewables manufacturing company. Building a decentralised and centralised Ecosystem to facilitate blockchain technology and the service industry in the UK. The main goal of this project is to help the British government deliver on its decarbonisation environmental plan. Our token will provide Reflection, BNB Rewards, Buybacks, Anti-Whale, and Liquidity Generation.Current problems facing the country right now are the rising inflation rate and future cost of living affecting the underprivileged communities putting a bigger gap between the rich and the poor. Some families live right up to the last penny and that means many poorer families are now struggling to afford the rising energy bills and the cost of food.#Real World Utilities⁃ Own British assets as NFTs⁃ Solar power generation⁃ Solid Ethical conceptRoadmap⁃ Presale launch⁃ BSC Token Launch⁃ Yeild Farming Dapp⁃ Building of trades database⁃ job management and booking app⁃ Government MCS accreditation approval for renewable incentives.⁃ First UK NFT Eco homes refurbishment project⁃ Completion of MCS Provider⁃ Solar thermal product⁃ Air source heat pump products⁃ Ground source heat pumps⁃ Solar PV system design⁃ Storage Batteries Production⁃ Underfloor heating product⁃ Eco X EV Chargers⁃ Further Collaboration with industry-leading manufacturers to innovate and scale up.⁃ Eco X Space Game and NFT Collection Launch. 5% of the total collection is split and distributed to presale wallets.⁃ Coinmarket Cap and Coingecko Listing⁃ Binance Exchanger ListingAccepted Payments:Perfect Money, Bitcoin, USDT ERC20, USDT TRC20, USDT BEP20, Litecoin, Dogecoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Tron, BNB, Dash, Stellar, BitcoinCash➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Visit Website: www.EcoXspace.comTelegram: https://t.me/ecoxspace➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖
